section.title: Inosculation
section.simpara: When branches or roots of different trees are in prolonged intimate contact, they often abrade each other, exposing their inner tissues, which may eventually fuse.
It’s not so much one tree feeding another as the formation of a new hybrid organism.

chapter.title: Dependencies
chapter.screen: sudo apt-get install -y asciidoctor sudo apt-get -y install calibre sudo gem install asciidoctor-pdf --pre sudo gem install rouge sudo dpkg -i pandoc-xx.xx.xx-amd64.deb
